findings.title: ST - Stops Transactions
findings.description: The contract stops transactions for all users excluding addresses that are excluded from fees.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: The contract is using variables that initialize only in the constructor and do not mutate in other functions.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity style guide for naming conventions.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: The contract has dead code that is never executed or reached during normal execution.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: The contract uses uninitialized local variables that can lead to unpredictable behavior.

findings.title: L17 - Usage of Solidity Assembly
findings.description: The contract uses assembly code which can be error-prone and difficult to read.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The contract does not check if the result of transfer methods is successful according to ERP20 specification.
